characters.name: Asta
characters.description:
__Height:__ 155 cm (5'1")

An orphan who was left under the care of a church in the village of Hage. He dreams of becoming ​the Wizard King but is unable to use magic, so he trains to build up his physical strength. He is the wielder of a five-leaf clover anti-magic grimoire and is a 3rd Class Junior Magic Knight of the Clover Kingdom's Black Bull and Royal Knights squads.

characters.name: Yuno
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm (5'7")

Yuno was left, along with Asta, in front of a church in a village called Hage when he was an infant. He grew up at the church and spends most of his day with Asta. Sometime later, a thug tries to take his necklace away from him and sell it for money. Fortunately, Asta steps in and tries to take it back. In the end, the thug decided to leave without the necklace after Asta keeps charging at him. Since then, Yuno stopped crying and decides to take Asta's dream to be the Wizard King as his own as well.

characters.name: Yami Sukehiro
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm

Yami Sukehiro is a foreigner from the Land of the Sun and the first captain of the Clover Kingdom's Black Bulls squad of the Magic Knights. ~!He is also a former member of the Grey Deer squad.!~

characters.name: Noelle Silva
characters.description:
__Height__: 161 cm (5'3")

Noelle Silva is a member of the Black Bulls and was inducted into the squad around the same time as Asta. She is the second daughter of one of the Clover Kingdom's royal families, House Silva, and the younger sister of the captain of the Silver Eagles, Nozel Silva. She likes sweets.

~!Her family disowned her due to her lack of control on her magic and having their mother die while giving birth to her.!~

characters.name: Finral Roulacase
alt_names: フィンラル・ルーラケイス
characters.description:
__Height:__ 173 cm (5'8'')

He is a nobleman of House Vaude and a member of Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad of the Magic Knights. He is from Tota, a village within the Clover Kingdom.

characters.name: Charlotte Roselei
alt_names: シャーロット・ローズレイ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 171 cm

Charlotte is a noblewoman of House Roselei and the captain of Clover Kingdom's Blue Rose squad of the Magic Knights.

She appears as a quiet, cold, and indifferent woman who keeps her emotions controlled and well hidden. She is constantly shown to appear as a rather stern woman, despite inwardly having an inward monologue that constantly appears to say calm down, especially around Yami Sukehiro. She often does not respond to situations that go out of hand, preferring to appear indifferent and let things play out. She does respond well to emergencies and pressing concerns, performing her duties and moving swiftly to take care of any problems that come up. However, she still is capable of losing her composure and becoming annoyed, which almost always involves Yami teasing of her. She is also a lightweight when it comes to alcohol, barely able to finish a pint before becoming drunk.

Charlotte considers her duty to the kingdom to be her foremost responsibility, with little interest in the social aspects of life. Her beauty is quite noticeable when she chooses to show it, but she is more comfortable in plate mail than silk dresses and cares little for the opinions of most others. She also has a hard time being open with most people and expressing herself on occasion. That said, she often quips back at her fellow captains when they make rash decisions or do something she considers stupid, particularly Yami. However, she also has admiration for those who are competent and work hard, though she rarely ever shows it. Outwardly, she displays little interest in finding a husband and becomes angry when the subject is brought up, for which Yami repeatedly teases her and calls her "Spiny Prickly Queen."

characters.name: Julius Novachrono
alt_names: ユリウス・ノヴァクロノ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm

The Wizard King of Clover Kingdom's Order of the Magic Knights.

__Chapter 333 spoiler:__
~!It is revealed that Julius was born in a body with two souls, with the other being [Lucius Zogratis](https://anilist.co/character/319876)!~

characters.name: Vanessa Enoteca
alt_names: バネッサ・エノテーカ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm

Originally from the Forest of Witches, Vanessa is a member of the Black Bull Brigade.

characters.name: Klaus Lunettes
alt_names: クラウス・リュネット
characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm

Klaus is a nobleman and a member of Clover Kingdom's Golden Dawn squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Mimosa Vermillion

characters.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm

Mimosa is a noblewoman of Clover Kingdom's House Vermillion and a member of the Golden Dawn squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Magna Swing
characters.description:
__Height:__ 169 cm

A member of the Black Bulls magic knight squad. Coming from Rayaka out in the countryside, he can easily bond with Asta whom he is profoundly impressed by.

His magic allows him to form fireballs which he can hurl at targets. He uses them as baseballs for the unofficial welcoming ceremonies he holds for new recruits. He can also form a magic bat for hitting his fireballs.

characters.name: William Vangeance
alt_names: ウィリアム・ヴァンジャンス
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm

Is the captain of Clover Kingdom's Golden Dawn squad of the Magic Knights. He is currently the closest person to becoming the next Wizard King.

characters.name: Nozel Silva
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177 cm

Is a nobleman and the oldest son of the Clover Kingdom's ruling family, House Silva. He is also the captain of the Silver Eagle squad of the Magic Knights. ~!He is also the son of Acier Silva, the older brother of Nebra Silva, Solid Silva and Noelle Silva, and the cousin of Kirsch Vermilion and Mimosa Vermilion.!~

characters.name: Lily Aquaria
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm
__Affinity:__ Water

A nun and caretaker at the orphanage in Hage.
 ~!In chapter 334, Lucius Zogratis transforms her to a Paladin.!~

characters.name: Grey
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Affinity: __Transformation
__Height:__ 159cm

A 3rd Class Junior Magic Knight of Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad.

characters.name: Gauche Adlai
characters.description:
__Height:__ 181 cm

He is a nobleman of House Adlai and a member of Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad. He is also the smartest and most clever member of the Black Bulls. Obsessed with his sister Marie.

characters.name: Charmy Pappitson
alt_names: チャーミー・パピットソン
characters.description:
__Height:__ 142 cm

Member of the Black Bull squad. She is an extremely big eater and tougher than she looks. When someone threatens to steal her meals, she becomes cold and merciless. In contrast, she is actually very generous and loves to share her meals with her friends, going so far as to constantly give them food after they have already expressed their satisfaction.

characters.name: Gordon Agrippa
alt_names: ゴードン・アグリッパ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 187 cm (6'1.6")
__Affinity:__ Poison Magic

He is a member of Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad of the Magic Knights.

Gordon was born into the Agrippa Family, a commoner family infamous for their Curse Magic. He grew up lonely and unable to make friends due to his magic and appearance. After receiving his grimoire, Gordon abandoned his family and joined the Black Bull squad of the Magic Knights. Over the years, he comes to view them as friends.

characters.name: Luck Voltia
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Affinity:__ Lightning
__Height:__ 167 cm

A 5th Class Junior Magic Knight of Clover Kingdom's Black Bull and Royal Knights squads.

__Height:__ 167 cm
__Species:__ Human

He is one of the advisers of the Magic Emperor.

alt_names: ゲルドル・ポイゾット

He is the former captain of Clover Kingdom's Violet Orca squad of the Magic Knights.

ジャック・ザ・リッパー
characters.description:
__Height:__ 197 cm

characters.name: Rill Boismortier
alt_names: リル・ボワモルティエ

__Height:__ 165 cm

characters.name: Dorothy Unsworth
alt_names: ドロシー・アンズワース
characters.description: Dorothy is the captain of Clover Kingdom's Coral Peacock squad of the Magic Knights. She sleeps most of the time, but when she is awake she can bring enemies into a dream world where she controls everything.

characters.name: Zora Ideale
characters.description: ~!Zora is the son of Zara Ideale, the first commoner Magic Knight, and is a rogue member of Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad. He assumes the identity of Xerx Lugner during the Royal Knights Selection Exam. Zora changes during the Selection Exam where he begins to take on a similar mindset to his father, with a strong trust in his comrades. The current Wizard King confronts Zora after the exam, speaking of how he was a friend of his fathers having met on the battlefield. The Wizard King prompts Zora to join the Magic Knight Squad he belongs in (presumably the Black Bulls), however Zora shrugs this off, ignoring the Wizard King. !~

characters.name: Sekke Bronzazza
alt_names: セッケ・ブロンザッザ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175 cm

Is a member of Clover Kingdom's Green Mantis squad.
A magic knight who fought and lost to Asta during their entrance exam. He befriended Asta in order to use him as a stepping stone to show off his powers which he believed to be superior, as Asta appeared to be an incompetent magician.

As a magic knight, he complains about how tough he has it in his squad and that he's always tasked with monotonous chores. He meets Asta's group while gambling with an elderly woman on the black market. He tries to impress the women Asta is with, but ends up getting stabbed in the foot by a paralysis inducing knife while chasing a burglar. Believing his life to be over, he tries to pass on his unfulfilled life's ambition to Asta before realizing his injury is far from fatal.

characters.name: Heath Grice
characters.description:
__Height:__ 187 cm

Heath is a rogue mage and member of the White Night Eye.

characters.name: Mars
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm

Mars is a mage of the Diamond Kingdom and one of its Eight Shining Generals. He is the Kingdom's product of human experimentation to enhance his Magic Power, with several magic stones embedded in his body.

characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm

Revchi was a member of the Clover Kingdom's Violet Orca squad of the Magic Knights, where he was known as Revchi of the chain. After some years, he leaves the organization for unknown reasons and becomes a thief.

characters.description:
__Affinity:__ Imitation

A rogue mage and a member of the Eye of the Midnight Sun's Third Eye. ~!He is an elf reincarnated into the body of a human.!~

A rogue mage.

“I'm going to make the person who did this to my brother pay... But before that, I need to pay for doing as he said... and not thinking for myself!”
— To Asta in The Man Who Cuts Death

— To Asta in The Man Who Cuts Death

characters.name: Kuro Nero
characters.description:
__Species:__ Anti-bird
__Height:__ 8 cm

An Anti-bird who decided to stay alongside Asta after encountering him at the beginning of the Magic Knights Entrance Exam.

~!It's later revealed that she is a human, her name is Secre Swallowtail. She was the servant of Lumiere Silvamillion Clover, prince of the Clover Kingdom and the first Magic Emperor. She is transformed into an anti-bird named Nero after sealing Lumiere into a statue.!~

characters.name: Leopold Vermillion

__Height:__ 164 cm

A nobleman and the second son of the Clover Kingdom's House Vermillion, one of its royal families. He is a member of the Crimson Lion squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Lemiel Silvamillion Clover
alt_names: ルミエル・シルヴァミリオン・クローバー
characters.description: First Wizard King of the Clover Kingdom.

characters.name: Zagred
characters.description: This devil is the mastermind behind the creation of Licht's five-leaf grimoire, the massacre of the Elf Tribe, and the reincarnation of the elves.

characters.name: Dante Zogratis
alt_names: ダンテ・ゾグラティス
characters.description:
Dante is a member of the Spade Kingdom's Dark Triad and the host of the devil Lucifero.

Dante seems to be a calm and easy going individual. Even in the face of a surprising turn of events, he does not lose his cool.

He believes that evil is the true nature of humanity and the world is too dull because of it. Therefore, he considers being called evil a compliment, and encourages other people to embrace their malice, as it is a supreme emotion only humans have. He often looks down on who he considers weaker than him. His native magic is Flesh Magic, and his Demon's, Lucifero, is Gravity Magic.

characters.name: Zenon Zogratis
alt_names: ゼノン・ゾグラティス
characters.description:
Zenon is a member of Spade Kingdom's Dark Triad
He is a tall man with black, messy hair. His most notable feature is a cross-shaped mark on the left side of his forehead and it extends down across his left eye. 
His magic Attribute is Bone Magic, and his Demon's magic gives him Spatial Magic

characters.name: Vanica Zogratis
alt_names: ヴァニカ・ゾグラティス
characters.description: Member of the Spade Kingdom's Dark Triad, and the host for the devil Megicula. She's a psychopath and she enjoys fightings against tough enemies. Her native magic is Blood Magic, whilst Megicula's magic is Curse Warding Magic.

characters.name: Undine
characters.description: Water Spirit that has served the Heart Kingdom for generations. Currently serving Lolopechka.

characters.name: Megicula
characters.description: Megicula 「メギキュラ Megikyura」 is a high-ranking devil who serves Vanica, a member of the Spade Kingdom's Dark Triad.

characters.name: Lucifero
characters.description: Lucifero is a high-ranking devil who serves Dante Zogratis, a member of the Spade Kingdom's Dark Triad.

characters.name: Nacht Faust
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm

Nacht is a devil host and a former nobleman of House Faust. He spent several years working as a spy within the Spade Kingdom.

~!He is the vice-captain of the Clover Kingdom's Black Bulls squad.!~

characters.name: Gimodelo
characters.description:
Gimodelo 「ギモデロ Gimodero」 is a devil who serves Nacht, the vice-captain of the Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad of the Magic Knights.

(Source: Black Clover wiki)

characters.name: Liebe
characters.description: ~!Liebe is the devil who resides within Licht's former grimoire, which is currently Asta's grimoire. He is the source behind Asta's Anti Magic.!~

characters.name: Licita
characters.description:
Licita was the foster mother of Liebe, the devil that currently recides within Asta's grimoire. She died protecting him from Lucifero.

~!In chapter 270, it was confirmed that she is Asta's mother.!~

characters.name: Morgen Faust
alt_names: モルゲン・ファウスト
characters.description:
~!Morgen Faust  was a former nobleman of House Faust, the younger twin brother of Nacht Faust, and a member of the Grey Deer squad of the Magic Knights.!~

~!Magic
Light Magic: Morgen used this magic attribute to generate and manipulate light.
Equipment
Grimoire: Morgen possessed a grimoire that contained various light-based magic spells.!~

~!Morgen had a jovial personality and behaved properly, as opposed to his twin's selfish attitude and delinquent behavior.!~

characters.name: Plumede
characters.description: Plumede is a devil who serves Nacht Faust, the vice-captain of the Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Lilith
characters.description: Lilith is one of the highest-ranking devils connected to the Tree of Qliphoth and resides on the first level of the underworld.

characters.name: Salamander
characters.description: Salamander is the spirit of fire who previously serves Fana and later Fuegoleon Vermillion.

characters.name: Slotos
characters.description: Slotos is a devil who serves Nacht Faust, the vice-captain of the Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Walgner
characters.description: Walgner is a devil who serves Nacht Faust, the vice-captain of the Clover Kingdom's Black Bull squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Loyce Grinberryall
alt_names: ロイス・グリンベリオール
characters.description: Loyce Grinberryall was the King of the Spade Kingdom, alongside his wife Ciel Grinberryall, untill the Zogratis Siblings attacked the palace and overthrew the royal family. ~!It is later revealed by Ralph Niaflem, that he is the father of Yuno.!~

characters.name: Ciel Grinberryall
alt_names: シエルグ・リンベリオール
characters.description: Ciel Grinberryall was the Queen of the Spade Kingdom, alongside her husband Loyce Grinberryall until the Zogratis Siblings attacked the palace and overthrew the royal family. ~!It is later revealed by Ralph Niaflem, that she is the mother of Yuno.!~

characters.name: Naamah
characters.description: Naamah is one of the highest-ranking devils connected to the Tree of Qliphoth and resides on the first level of the underworld.

characters.name: Willie
characters.description: Willie is a member of the Clover Kingdom's Green Mantis squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Nix
characters.description: Nix is a member of Clover Kingdom's Green Mantis squad of the Magic Knights.

characters.name: Galleo
characters.description: Galleo is the commander of the Diamond Kingdom assassination squad.

characters.name: Sarado
characters.description: Sarado is a Spirit Guardian of the Heart Kingdom.

characters.name: Smurik
characters.description: Smurik is a Spirit Guardian of the Heart Kingdom.

characters.name: Floga
characters.description: Floga is a Spirit Guardian of the Heart Kingdom.

characters.name: Potrof
characters.description: Potrof is a Spirit Guardian of the Heart Kingdom.

characters.name: Adrammelech
characters.description: Like most devils, Adrammelech looks down on humans and their abilities. This devil is apathetic, opting to warn the humans rather than attack them.

characters.name: Lolopechka

characters.name: Patry

characters.name: Lucius
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm

~!The eldest of the Zogratis siblings.!~

~!It is revealed in chapter 333 that Julius is actually Lucius Zogratis’ twin brother, sharing the same body with two souls inhabiting it.!~

~!He has a contract with Astaroth, the higher devil of time magic.!~
